entry.title: Shure RMCE-LTG Remote + Mic Lightning Accessory Cable SE Earphones
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shure
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 99.99

Lightning cable enables SE Sound Isolating™ Earphones with detachable cables to connect with iOS devices with lightning connector for high-quality audio and communication control.

Product Details

The RMCE-LTG provides a major performance upgrade for all Apple iOS devices with a Lightning® connector in combination with Shure SE model Sound Isolating™ Earphones with detachable cables.

Incorporating a digital-to-analog convertor (DAC) and amplifier, the RMCE-LTG features state-of-the-art circuitry matched to the specific sonic and performance characteristics of SE Sound Isolating™ earphones.

Features:
  • Sleek, integrated remote/DAC-in-one design
  • Microphone placement optimized for clarity of speech and intelligibility of voice commands
  • Simple, plug-and-play operation for Apple iOS devices
  • Firmware upgradable with the ShurePlus™ MOTIV App
  • Certified via the Apple MFI program
  • High-quality digital audio playback (up to 24-bit/48 kHz) over Apple’s Lightning® connector
  • Voice transmission
  • Phone control
  • The Lightning Audio Module supports 3-button remote control functionality

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

entry.title: Shure MV5 Digital Condenser Microphone
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shure
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 99.00

It’s an amazing time to be creative. Getting your inspiration out there is as close as your computer or even your phone. But your audio could be better. Way better, right? The MV5 fixes that. With pristine sound recording and intuitive app controls that’s travel-worthy.

How it Works

A legend in audio, Shure designed the MV5 to connect and record via Lightning or USB directly to your phone, without sound distortion. Use vocal, instrument, or flat settings to customize your recording—and the ShurePlus™ MOTIV™ Audio app for pro editing on-the-go. Upgrade your podcast, vlog, or voiceover recordings and stand out from the competition.

Why it's Better
  • Mighty with history: the MV5 packs the clarity of almost a century of audio experience into a super-portable microphone. You get sound quality, squared.
  • Singular simplicity: though you’ll be set up in seconds, it’s also easy to select vocals, flat or instrument modes so you’re good to go when inspiration strikes.
  • Globetrotting audio: designed to travel with your computer or phone, the MV5 rests on its own or connects via a standard ¼” mount to the included desktop stand.
  • Easy, friendly control: the ShurePlus MOTIV Audio app gives you the ability to record studio-quality audio—and so much more. Trim and share in multiple formats with a few quick taps.
Quality that's in the Details
  • Legendary recording capability
  • Compatible with iOS, Mac and PC
  • Real-time monitoring
  • Presets for vocals, instrument or flat
  • Removable stand and tripod compatibility
  • ShurePlus MOTIV Audio app for recording and onscreen control
Package contains:
  • AMV5-DS Desktop Stand
  • AMV-USB Micro-B-to-USB Cable (1 m.)
  • AMV-LTG Micro-B-to-Lightning Cable (1 m.)

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: Sennheiser MKE 440 Professional Stereo Shotgun Microphone (MKE 440)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sennheiser
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 349.95

The MKE 440 has two aligned and matched mini shotgun mics ensuring that the MKE 440 captures the audio you want while rejecting off-axis noise. This feature sets it apart from conventional stereo microphones. With its optimized acoustic characteristics and adjustable sensitivity, the MKE 440 is ideally suited for speech, music or ambience. The stainless steel micro-mesh wind protection reduces wind noise and protects the fine high frequency details in your sound.

  • Dual mini shotgun mics create frontal focus
  • Suppression of ambience and background noise
  • Built-in elastic suspension and wind protection
  • 3-level sensitivity adjustment and low-cut
  • Compact, all-metal construction that fits on Standard size camera shoe mount

entry.title: Sennheiser ClipMic Digital Mobile Recording Microphone for iOS Devices
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sennheiser
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 199.00

Whether you are a journalist looking for an easy audio solution for field interviews, a lecturer that wants to record a talk or even a parent recording their child reciting a poem – the new digital clip-on microphones from Sennheiser and Apogee help you to capture sound professionally. ClipMic digital combines Apogee’s A/D conversion expertise with Sennheiser’s microphone design knowledge to give users optimum sound quality for their recordings – especially designed for iOS-devices with Lightning connector.

High Quality Recording

When paired with a modern Apple (iOS) device, ClipMic digital delivers exceptional audio quality. The ME 2 omni-directional lavalier microphone captures the sound source while screening out unwanted background noise. Then the in-line, high resolution signal converter developed by Apogee digitally transmits the sound via the Lightning connector with exceptional clarity.

Simplified Audio and Video Editing

MetaRecorder allows the application of metadata tags to your audio files while recording in the field. When these files are imported into Final Cut Pro on a Mac, the captured metadata greatly simplifies the process of organizing and editing your media to accelerate postproduction workflow. (Apple, iOS, iPad, iPhone, iPod and Final Cut Pro are registered trademarks of Apple Inc.)

General specifications:
  • Plug and play - connect ClipMic digital to the Lightning port on your iOS device and begin recording!
  • Sennheiser ME 2 microphone - omni-directional capsule delivers superb clarity and speech intelligibility
  • Lightning connector - is Apple MFi Certified to insure reliability
  • Digital interface - Apogee 24 bit/96 kHz digital interface designed specifically for Apple devices (iPhone, iPad or iPod touch) provides exceptional audio performance
  • Apogee MetaRecorder app – is a free download from the App Store making recording, tagging and organizing audio in the field simple and efficient

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

Vendor: Focal
Type: Audio Accessories

Got a pair of Focal CMS 40 studio monitors? Want to take them everywhere you go? Naturally you do! And with this Focal CMS 40 Bag, you've got the perfect way to transport your favorite monitors wherever your music-production work takes you. Made of rugged black nylon, this CMS 40 Bag offers your monitors a tough layer of protection against scrapes, bumps, dings, and the general wear and tear of transportation. It's the perfect fit for two CMS 40s, plus there's a large storage pocket for your cables and other essential gear made into the Focal CMS 40 Bag.

entry.title: Devialet VY510US Accessory Dialog Wireless Smart Hub for Phantom
entry.summary:
Vendor: Devialet
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 329.00

Dialog is the hub that allows you to connect several Phantom together wirelessly, from 2 Phantom to 24 Phantom, to create Hi-Fi or Multi-Room systems.

Dialog is necessary to connect more than one Phantom for a multi-room or stereo experience. Dialog is not necessary to play online streaming services through Bluetooth to one Phantom.

Designed and assembled in France. Only works with Phantom Premier: Phantom Gold (4500W), Phantom Silver (3000W), Classic Phantom (1200W).

entry.title: Devialet Care 3 Year Insurance for Devialet Phantom
entry.summary:
Vendor: Devialet
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 299.00

Protect your investment

With Devialet Care, your Phantom Premier investment is protected with an extra year of warranty and can be replaced once at a preferential price in case of accidental damage (see Devialet Care replacement prices below).

  • 3 years Guarantee Extension
  • Protect your Phantom up to 30 days after its purchase
  • Covers one accidental Incident
Why signup for Devialet Care?

Our three-year insurance policy makes sure you’re covered. Instantly. For one instance of accidental damage or breakage. Gold standard, guaranteed.

How do I activate Devialet Care

To activate Devialet Care, head on over to your user account. In just a few clicks, you're all covered.

Do I have to purchase Devialet Care at the same time as Phantom

You've got 30 days to buy Devialet Care from the moment you purchase Phantom. Make sure you get covered before it's too late...!

entry.title: Audio-Technica VMN70SP Replacement Stylus
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audio Technica
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 89.00

Replacement stylus for VM670SP

Even the finest diamond stylus becomes worn after an extended period of play.The styli in our VM cartridges are no different. But it is easy to replace the stylus and continue to use your cartridge. Our renewed VM cartridges have 7 styli and 3 types of bodies to choose from. Not only is it not necessary to buy an entirely new cartridge, but you can also enjoy the experience of upgrading your stylus or trying a new cartridge/stylus combination.

The cartridge becomes worn after an extended period of play, even the finest diamond stylus. Our VM cartridges can be used again for a long time only by replacing the stylus. Our renewed VM cartridges have 7 styli and 3 types of bodies. Not only it is not necessary to buy the cartridge itself, but also you experience the enjoyment of upgrade or various combination of VM cartridges.

General specifications:
  • Conical (3mil) stylus
  • Nude Rectangular Shank construction
  • Grey

entry.title: Audio-Technica VM750SH Dual Moving Magnet Cartridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audio Technica
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 399.00

The VM750SH Shibata stylus cartridge is a premier 700 Series model in Audio-Technica’s new VM cartridge line – a line that harks back to A-T’s early days as a manufacturer primarily of high-end phono cartridges, while also incorporating today’s advanced technology. Like all VM cartridges, the VM750SH is equipped with dual magnets that are positioned to match the left and right channels in the stereo record groove for outstanding channel separation and extended frequency response. The cartridge’s Shibata stylus provides greater surface contact with the record groove than an elliptical stylus does, resulting in the pickup of ultra-high frequencies with less groove stress and distortion. Includes mounting hardware.

Features:
  • VM dual magnet cartridge with Shibata stylus
  • Aluminum tapered cantilever
  • Paratoroidal coils improve generating efficiency
  • Center shield plate between the left and right channels reduces crosstalk
  • Die-cast aluminum alloy housing reduces vibration and adds a natural electrical shiel

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: Audio-Technica VM740ML Dual Moving Magnet Cartridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audio Technica
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 329.00

The VM740ML MicroLine® stylus cartridge is a premier 700 Series model in Audio-Technica’s new VM cartridge line – a line that harks back to A-T’s early days as a manufacturer primarily of high-end phono cartridges, while also incorporating today’s advanced technology. Like all VM cartridges, the VM740ML is equipped with dual magnets that are positioned to match the left and right channels in the stereo record groove for outstanding channel separation and extended frequency response. The cartridge’s MicroLine® stylus allows it to trace the record groove with incredible accuracy, resulting in nuanced audio reproduction that elliptical and conical styli simply can’t match. The stylus’s multilevel shape also wears better than other styli, while reducing the wear on your records. Includes mounting hardware.

Features:
  • VM dual magnet cartridge with MicroLine® stylus
  • Aluminum tapered cantilever
  • Paratoroidal coils improve generating efficiency
  • Center shield plate between the left and right channels reduces crosstalk
  • Die-cast aluminum alloy housing reduces vibration and adds a natural electrical shield

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

entry.title: Audio-Technica VM530EN Dual Moving Magnet Cartridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audio Technica
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 179.00

The VM530EN is a top-end elliptical stylus cartridge in Audio-Technica’s new VM cartridge line – a line that harks back to A-T’s early days as a manufacturer primarily of high-end phono cartridges, while also incorporating today’s advanced technology. Like all VM cartridges, the VM530EN is equipped with dual magnets that are positioned to match the left and right channels in the stereo record groove for outstanding channel separation and extended frequency response. The cartridge’s lightweight 0.3 x 0.7 mil elliptical nude stylus reduces the execution mass of the vibration system, enabling fuller frequency reproduction and less tracking distortion than a bonded stylus. Includes mounting hardware.

Features:
  • VM dual magnet cartridge with 0.3 x 0.7 mil elliptical nude stylus
  • Aluminum cantilever
  • Paratoroidal coils improve generating efficiency
  • Center shield plate between the left and right channels reduces crosstalk
  • Durable low-resonance polymer cartridge housing

entry.title: Audio-Technica AT-OC9ML/II Dual Moving MicroCoil Cartridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audio Technica
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 699.00

Moving coil cartridge with MicroLine® diamond tip, for the best in clarity, transparency, precise stereo imaging, lower distortion and even wear for extended vinyl and stylus life. A-T Vector-Aligned design, with two moving coils mounted at 90 degrees in place of the two moving magnets.

Features:
  • Frequency Response: 15-50,000 Hz
  • Channel Separation: 31/21 (dB at 1 kHz/10 kHz)
  • Vertical Tracking Force: 1.25-1.75 grams
  • Stylus Construction Nude square shank
  • Recommended Load Impedance: 20 ohms
  • Output: 0.4 (mV at 1 kHz, 5 cm/sec)
  • Channel Balance: 1.0 dB
  • Stylus Shape: MicroLine®
  • Cantilever: Gold-plated boron
  • Mount: Half-inch
Note: Moving coil cartridges require receivers or preamps with compatible inputs; their stylus assemblies are not field-replaceable.

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.
